"About Endless Quests":
"Endless Quests are an endless mission in which the aim is to see how far you can advance within the time limit.

Since the mission order is random, the ability to adapt quickly and think on your feet is important.

By completing the Mission Orders in each mission, you can increase your time limit.
Go the distance and get a high score!
"

"Your high scores are saved separately, split up by quest, difficulty level and conditions.

Find conditions that let you push yourself to your limit."
